sections.title: Layout of Rust `enum` types
sections.content:
**This page has been archived**

It did not actually reflect current layout guarantees and caused frequent confusion.

The old content can be accessed on GitHub.

paragraphs.ucg_layout_of_rust_enum_types_p2: It did not actually reflect current layout guarantees and caused frequent confusion.
paragraphs.ucg_layout_of_rust_enum_types_p3: The old content can be accessed on GitHub.
